ETYMOLOGY: From Latin praedicere, from prae- ('before') + dicere ('to say, tell'). Literally 'to say beforehand.'

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: transitive verb (requires a direct object or clause)
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: To say or estimate that a specified thing will happen in the future or as a consequence of something.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 预言；预测；预告 (根据已知信息判断未来事件)。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: It is difficult to predict the outcome of the election.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 很难预测这次选举的结果。
